message: Let's start fair. I propose we split it 60/40 in my favor.  We have time to negotiate, but I think this is a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice.  Let's meet in the middle. How about 55/45?
Okay, I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's split it evenly this time. We're both losing money with each round, so let's be reasonable.
